import './styles.css' import { useState } from 'react' function App() { // Liste over bilde og info const pictureList = [ { id: 1, img: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1469474968028-56623f02e42e?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1748&q=80', alt: 'Landscape of mountain', }, { id: 2, img: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1469474968028-56623f02e42e?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1748&q=80', alt: 'Landscape of mountain', }, { id: 3, img: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1469474968028-56623f02e42e?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1748&q=80', alt: 'Landscape of mountain', }, ] // useState for å lagre hvilken bilde som skal vises const [current, setCurrent] = useState(pictureList[0]) const handleClick = (event) => { event.preventDefault() setCurrent(pictureList[event.currentTarget.id]) console.log(event.currentTarget) } return (

PICTURES FROM SUMMER 2020

Nulla facilisi. Proin hendrerit lacus vitae sapien faucibus consectetur. Morbi mattis eleifend aliquam. Proin non semper metus. Integer vehicula purus eu facilisis auctor. Aliquam id feugiat libero, a sollicitudin tellus.

) } export default App
